guide.conclusion: In the end u should have a healthy and delicous chicken

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • oven, measuring spoons, a baser
Tools
  • a whole chicken,a large oven cake pan,a baser,lemon or lemons(depending how zesty u want your chicken to be),seasoning(italian seasoning,black pepper,onion powder,garlic powder,salt,allspice ground,halim spice mix(hot),brown sugar

lines.text: Ok first u need to take your uncooked chicken out of the packaging and rinse it off.
lines.text_raw: Ok first u need to take your uncooked chicken out of the packaging and rinse it off.

lines.text: Take a cearl bowl and put 2-3 tbs. of brown sugar mixed with 1-2 cups of water. Then squeez the lemon or lemons over the mixture and stir. Also add the seasoning to the bowl.
lines.text_raw: Take a cearl bowl and put 2-3 tbs. of brown sugar mixed with 1-2 cups of water. Then squeez the lemon or lemons over the mixture and stir. Also add the seasoning to the bowl.

lines.text: Afterwards take the brush and dip it into the mixture and brush it over the uncooked chicken.  Then pour the rest of it into the pan.
lines.text_raw: Afterwards take the brush and dip it into the mixture and brush it over the uncooked chicken.  Then pour the rest of it into the pan.

lines.text: Put the chicken into the oven and set the temperture to 350 degress.  Moniter the chicken or wait until brown.
lines.text_raw: Put the chicken into the oven and set the temperture to 350 degress.  Moniter the chicken or wait until brown.

lines.text: Once the chicken is done take it out and ENJOY!! :)
lines.text_raw: Once the chicken is done take it out and ENJOY!! :)

guide.summary: Now this is how u make a delicous chicken with awsome flavors it will start melting off the bone!  YUM!!  This guide will teach teens and adults how to make a delicous chicken for their family or on a special occaion.
guide.time_required: about an hour or two or until brown
guide.title: How to make a delicous chicken!!

tools.text: a whole chicken,a large oven cake pan,a baser,lemon or lemons(depending how zesty u want your chicken to be),seasoning(italian seasoning,black pepper,onion powder,garlic powder,salt,allspice ground,halim spice mix(hot),brown sugar
